thread.title: Eminem Has Choice Words For Donald Trump on New Big Sean Song - Listen Now!
thread.title_full: Eminem Has Choice Words For Donald Trump on New Big Sean Song - Listen Now!

author: Just Jared
title: Eminem Has Choice Words For Donald Trump on New Big Sean Song - Listen Now!
text:
Eminem is speaking his mind about Donald Trump on Big Sean ‘s new album. 
The 44-year-old rapper made a guest appearance on “No Favors” off of his album I Decided. and goes as far as to call Donald a bitch! 
“Iâm anti/ Canât no government handle a commando/ Your man donât want it/ Trump âs a bitch/ Iâll make his whole brand go under,” Eminem raps. 
After the release, Big Sean took to his Twitter to thank Eminem for the verse. 
“No Favors feels like back to back homeruns, you f**kin destroyed this verse! Thank you for blessing the album w/ this! #Detroit,” he wrote. 
Listen the song below and make sure to check out the rest of Big Sean ‘s new album .
